original_text: Then spake the priests and the prophets unto the princes and to all the people, saying, This man is worthy to die; for he hath prophesied against this city, as ye have heard with your ears.
korean_text: 제사장들과 선지자들이 고관들과 모든 백성에게 말하여 이르되 이 사람은 죽는 것이 합당하니 너희 귀로 들음 같이 이 성에 관하여 예언하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Then spake the priests and the prophets
unto the princes and to all the people
This man is worthy to die
for he hath prophesied against this city
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 성에 대하여 예언했기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: as ye have heard with your ears
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 너희 귀로 들은 바와 같이
